content: Wow
alright this crap is gonna start out with being nice around the office and
most offices have these pencil sharpeners and they really do some nice
shavings as far as what would work for flocking so look at that that has some
nice it's cut into little strips really nice for flocking so I'll just empty
those out and I've went around the office emptied out all the pencil
sharpeners and I got a nice amount of material for a flocking so I really like
how that looks that'll work great for our homemade
flocking so now I've got a plastic container picked a green color paint you
can really use any green you want I'm gonna pour out the paint in the
container add some water the paint bottle get the rest out and then pour it
in there and then mix that up so it's all even and then start pouring in my
material my pencil shavings just mix them up make sure they soak up all that
nice green color pour the rest in there mix it up some more if you want to get a
dog the goal is to get it all even throughout the entire mixture so just
keep mix until you feel that that's given all the way through and it's kind
of fluff it up now I've got just a plaster plate here
disposable plate and I'm just gonna pour it out of the container I just mix it up
in onto the plate okay I got a glove here so I don't get my hands green but
I'm gonna spread it out put some more on there you want to spread it out so it'll
dry quicker just leave it in the cup it'll take forever to dry and it could
kind of clump together when it dries so the next step is I'm just getting a
plastic bowl and a strainer okay you don't want to use wondering to use for
food but you know it's one summer my garage sale or something then just pour
all this dry pencil shavings into the strainer okay so I'll just put those in
there and they're ready to go so I'm gonna use just a plastic or I'm sorry a
glass jar and just kind of push it into the mesh and that'll push it through
into the bowl and that will give me some nice grass grass like texture so here we
go here is the stuff I've got out of the bowl and look at that that's really
really nice it has it really looks like grass it has that kind of texture and
the color is really nice too and we can store those in that plastic
bowl and that plastic container now here I've got a ruins I'm working on and I
want to add some flock to it and show you what it how it works so I'll just
glue it on with some just pba white glue and then just go around the ruin and put
where I want the grass to be there we go and then just start sprinkling it on it
make sure you cover up all the glue just keep going around the ruing and fill
that up and then we'll let it dry now it is dried and I'm going to use a lighter
green on this flocking to paint the flopping because I don't want it all in
one shade I want to kind of make it a couple shades and look how that's really
popping out there and that's really nice with these shavings because they're wood
so they hold up really well it could be really hard to paint regular flock like
this so and see how that nice that color variations really bringing
that out that ruin really looks good so spin it around there for you and see how
that color difference looks good and the pencil shavings really really make nice
flocking looks really great hey you yeah you back here huh I know it
was short but would you expect your the short tip watching longer episodes if
you want Jesus quit bugging me hey and make sure you join the forum too
much for that oh yeah and have a magical craptastic day
